modName: Mod Rescource Crazy NPC Voice Pack
summary:
Another voice pack, this time a crazy person, similar in the style of cicero.
Perfect for those crazy /evil quest lines.
Or even just as an npc weirdo.
descriptionHtml:
Again, these voice packs do not add anything to the game, but I am simply providing me voice acting and saving them as individual ogg files for your mods.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
here is an example of what quest you can make with this pack:

NPC:1 What do we have here, another player in the game?
Player: What... are you wearing!?
NPC: 07 - HEY!, dont look at me like that!
Player: Sorry... but, your a little weird!
NPC: 05 - You know what happened to the last person who said that.... neither do I!
Player: riiighhht..... who are you?
NPC: 11:  Who Me, or him.. or, the one we dont talk about.

And you can probbably think of the rest, all the files are there, all you need is your modding and your imagination =D

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Below is the script of what is contained in the file:

Introductions:
1 What do we have here, another player in the game?
2 Welcome Welcome, to the greatest show on earth!
3 Oh, whats this, come to play


Replys: General Conversation:

1. oooooo a question.
2. You know what happened to the last person who said that, neither do I!
3. Ooo,No No NO, that just wont do.
4. Hey, Dont look at me like that.
5. They dont have to understand me, just fear me.
6. What would be the point?
7. Yes yes, I agree.
 
Who are you?

1. Who Me, or him.. or, the one we dont talk about.

The one we dont talk about:
1. Oh well, we locked him up, for the best, him being the crazy one and all.

Who\'s we?
1. Dont be silly, you mean you cannot hear jimmy? He is always
 in my head.... always in my head.

Do you know any secrets?
1. No, but jimmy does.

Ok, Jimmy, what secrets do you know?
1.  Oh!, Jimmy left this for you, he must have known you were dropping by!

Ok, Good Bye
1. Oh, your going to leave me... just like, all the others.






below is the script for these files ( all files are numbered in the zip)
author: AllanOcelot
